bibl.title: Some Rabbinic Themes in Magical Papyri.

series.title: Journal for the Study of Judaism
JSJ

bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. One Hundred and Forty Tongues [in a "Jewish" portion of the great Paris magical papyrus (P.G.M. IV, 3056-3058)]. - 2. Salomon's seal on Jeremiah's tongue. - 3. Thrakai(m) and Gabriel [in a Coptic charm]. - Conclusion. "We have again uncovered remnants of Rabbinic exegesis which have filtered through (in an altered form) into Hellenistic magical lore."
